attributes.additional_details: So I don't lose my things. To abolish sexism and so I don't have to wate money on bags and stop my things being easily stolen.
attributes.background: Make women's and men's pocket sizes equal . Eliminate fake pockets. Make women's clothing's pockets be able to carry more than one item and large enough to hold a phone without it falling out.

rejection.details: Decisions about pocket sizing are a matter for individual clothing manufacturers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
